entries.next: Welcome again to our hotel. Please go right in.
entries.cantwork: Welcome. I'm afraid you've arrived at a rather distracting time. You see -- ah, but I see you're busy. Perhaps you might return later --?
entries.npc_reset_1: I perfectly understand. But do please check back with me -- er, if you are willing --?
entries.npc_1_1: Oh my. I'm sorry, you've arrived at a distracting time. Actually, perhaps you might help. It appears our offworld tour group from Duzay has gone astray from their scheduled nature walk. They've left behind their signal finder to guide them back here. The wilderness is dangerous. Please deliver the signal finder to the group leader.
entries.npc_2_1: Ah, splendid. I shall remain here. Please report back after you've delivered the signal finder to the guide.
entries.npc_3_1: Ah. Very well. Please enjoy your visit. By all means look around the hotel; it's quite attractive.
entries.npc_4_1: The Lake Retreat Hotel offers elegant rooms, superb conference facilities, and the most attentive service for its guests. Which leads me back to the subject of this job -- yes or no?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: I really have nothing more I can tell you. Please hurry.
entries.npc_reward_1: Fine, fine. I'm relieved to report the Duzay tour guide has reunited the group. Please check back with me for other odd jobs -- er, if you feel so inclined --?
entries.npc_work_1: Welcome back. Except, er -- I think you still have a small task to perform for me --?
entries.npc_noloc_1: As I reflect on the matter, I cannot recall where I left the signal finder. I must find it. Please consult with me later.
entries.npc_failure_1: Oh, dear. I hope the tour group will be all right. We lose so many tour groups nowadays.
entries.npc_breech_1: Heydo! Yousa bringin' mesa signal finder?
entries.npc_takeme_1: Ooh, tanks! Mesa so sorry my left dis behind. Wesa had getting' lost into capper spineflap territory. Desa bugs, deysa bombad!
entries.npc_smuggle_1: Tanks!  Meesa can find mee own way now.
entries.gotowork_1: Ello! My needin' dat signal finder bombad. Mebbe yousa bringin' it soon, mesa hopen.
entries.notit_1: Ooh, tanks -- but wait, mesa sorry. Disa not mesa signal finder.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_1_2: Ah, welcome. Again you've arrived at a confused time. A tourist from the Duzay group is lost. He went looking for Naboo herbs, because he's an herbalist. Please bring him back here -- er, if you will --?
entries.npc_2_2: Excellent.  I shall wait here for your return.
entries.npc_3_2: Oh, that's too bad.  I hope nothing happens to him.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Please hurry.  I'm desperately worried about our friend.
entries.npc_work_2: Did you bring back our intrepid herbalist?
entries.npc_breech_2: Ah.  Are you from the Hotel?
entries.npc_takeme_2: Lead on, and I shall follow.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_1_3: Oh, dear, it's been a never-ending series of calamities today. Just before you got here, we sent out another adventurer to look for the lost tour group. Please go and find him.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_reset_2: I perfectly understand. But do please check back with me -- er, if you are willing --?
entries.npc_reset_3: I perfectly understand. But do please check back with me -- er, if you are willing --?
entries.npc_reset_4: I perfectly understand. But do please check back with me -- er, if you are willing --?
entries.npc_reset_5: I perfectly understand. But do please check back with me -- er, if you are willing --?
entries.npc_reset_6: I perfectly understand. But do please check back with me -- er, if you are willing --?
